Name: FUYU FSK40 Gantry Linear Guide Stage XYZ Slide Table X=600mm,Y=600mm,Z=400mm Stroke Linear Stage Module for DIY
Jetson Orin Nano Motherboard (CPU+GPU)
Requirements:
need high resolution to see mites
send results to main SaaS platform (WiFi / LoRaWan / 4G)

Name: Frame camera(s)
Requirements:
• internal camera (or camera array) should give us high-resolution (min 20MP) result of the entire frame
• an array of 3-9 cameras? pros = better vision of cells. cons = price and complexity (wiring, stitching image together)
• a scanner? = moving parts = risky

Name: Wi-Fi networking
Requirements: send results to main SaaS platform (WiFi / 4G). Optional replacement - Lorawan (gateway by the customer)

Name: Entrance camera(s)
Requirements:
Can be low-cost, need to have ~8MP

• do we need stereo for depth / disparity mapping?
• focal point of ~10-15 cm, need to capture entrance that is 15cm wide

Name: Display
Vendor: Hosyond 7 Inch IPS LCD Touch Screen 1024×600 Capacitive Screen HDMI
Requirements: show statistics of the hive on the device itself

Name: Aluminium profile 20x20x300mm
Requirements: stand for both hive and robotic block

Name: Internal lighting - addressable LED strip WS2811
Requirements: We don’t want to disrupt the bees, so internal lighting should be dimmable (gradual) when it turns on to take a photo
